item.description:
To get everyone ready for a 5K, event we will be posting training events using the "Couch to 5K" training schedule. This link is posted on the message board under "training for a 5K" along with information on the October 4th 5K in Braintree.

Joggers and walkers of all levels are welcome to join us at your own pace.

Remember to bring your sneakers and some water!

Wednesday, August 19th
7pm
Braintree High School
Track

Fee: Annual Members - FREE, Members and Guests - $2 per person

Event Organizer(s): Julie & Amanda

Min/Max: At least 6 Yes RSVPs by 4pm on Wednesday, August 19th. Attendance is unlimited.
Guests: Welcome!

RSVP Deadline: Please finalize your RSVP by 4pm on Wednesday, August 19th. If you change your RSVP after the deadline, this will count as a "no show".


Inclement Weather: Heavy rains will cancel. We will train if it is overcast or there is a slight drizzle. Please plan to bring a lightweight jacket with a hood just in case. (We will do our best to notify everyone if this event is canceled by 3pm on the day of the training.)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Directions: Please see “Directions to Frequently Used Venues” Discussion Thread on the Message Board. You may click on the following link. http://fitness.meetup....

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: 5K Training (Walkers and Joggers Welcome)
